name: Waste Management and Energy Recovery
description: Studies on converting waste materials into energy and the environmental impacts of waste management.

name: Renewable Energy Integration
description: Research on integrating renewable energy sources into existing energy systems and optimizing their performance.

name: Sustainable Construction Practices
description: Studies on sustainable materials and practices in construction to enhance environmental performance.

name: Structural Performance Analysis
description: Research on the performance of structural elements under various loading conditions and the effectiveness of strengthening techniques.

name: Nanomaterials in Energy Applications
description: Studies on the use of nanomaterials for energy storage and conversion technologies.

name: Biomedical Applications of Nanomaterials
description: Research on the use of nanomaterials in drug delivery and medical diagnostics.

name: AI in Healthcare
description: Studies on the use of AI technologies in improving healthcare delivery and patient outcomes.

name: AI in Engineering Education
description: Research on the integration of AI technologies in engineering education to enhance learning experiences.

name: Seismic Risk Assessment
description: Studies on assessing the seismic risk of structures and developing mitigation strategies.

name: Structural Integrity and Performance
description: Research on the performance of structural elements under various loading conditions and environmental factors.

name: Water Quality Monitoring
description: Studies on monitoring and improving water quality in various environments.

name: Sustainable Water Management Practices
description: Research on sustainable practices for managing water resources in urban and rural settings.

name: Robotic Rehabilitation Systems
description: Studies on the design and control of robotic systems for rehabilitation purposes.

name: Cable-Driven Robotics
description: Research on the design and control of cable-driven robots for various applications.
